alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 9:37PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Keokuk, Johnson, southwestern Linn and eastern Iowa Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 936 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williamsburg, or 12 miles southeast of Marengo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. The thunderstorms will be near... Oxford around 950 PM CST. Coralville and Tiffin around 955 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include North Liberty, University Heights, Swisher, Shueyville, Oakdale, Iowa City, Lake Macbride State Park, Solon and Ely. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 212 and 250. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
